data.title: CPJ 1st Sem History Notes
data.meta_description: Cpj 1st Sem History Notes - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document discusses the meaning and scope of history, and the relationship between history and law. It provides definitions of history from various scholars as a narrative or record of past events. The scope of history includes narrating country-specific past events, ascertaining truth without bias, understanding total human actions, and interpreting historical facts, processes, causes and effects. Law is understood in historical context, as it evolves with society. Studying legal history helps understand the development of institutions, freedoms, and governance over time. However, history can be interpreted in various ways, so care must be taken to avoid distortions.
